name: プロデューサー
text:
透、お疲れ様
なんていうか……堂々としてたよ
trans:
Toru, good work out there.
It was like... what's the word? You were majestic.

name: プロデューサー
text:
いや、うん……
半分は褒めてるんだけど──
trans:
Um, yeah...
Well, the praise is half of what I wanted to say──

name: プロデューサー
text:
カメラに抜かれた時に
ぼんやりしてるのは、ちょっとな
trans: When you were caught in the cameras, you came off like you were──off somewhere else, kind of.

name: プロデューサー
text:
今日はさ、ウケてたから問題ないけど
ピリッとしちゃうこともあるからな？
trans: I mean, they liked it today, so no problem there, but there's also times that kind of thing'll hang in the air, won't it?

name: 透
text:
うん
まぁ、ぼんやりしてたっていうか……

name: 透
text: 考え事してたんだけどね
trans: I just had things I was thinking about, really.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……はは
見た目はそんなに変わらないからな？
trans:
...haha.
It doesn't look that much different from the outside, y'know?
